changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE securities ( secid VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, shortname VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, regnumber VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, is_traded BOOLEAN NOT NULL, emitent_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(secid));

changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE histories ( secid VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, tradedate VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, numtrades FLOAT4 NOT NULL, value FLOAT4 NOT NULL, open FLOAT4 NOT NULL, low FLOAT4 NOT NULL, high FLOAT4 NOT NULL, close FLOAT4 NOT NULL, volume FLOAT4 NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(secid, tradedate));
